lead_paragraph: DiPRETA--Manlio C.,on March 11, 2016 of Manhasset. Beloved husband of Laurie. Loving father of Nicholas, Christopher, Steven, Paul and Isabella. Cherished son of Gelsomina and the late Donato. Devoted brother of Adriana, John, Maria, Flora, Mauro and Angelo. Loving uncle to many nieces and nephews. Visitation will be held at Fairchild Funeral Chapel, 1570 Northern Blvd., Manhasset on Tuesday from 2-4pm and 7-9pm. Funeral service Wednesday, 9:00am at the funeral home with interment to follow at Nassau Knolls Cemetery, Port Washington. Donations may be made to the Lustgarten Foundation www.lustgarten.org 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DIPRETA, MANLIO C.
